Text: whoa, thanks man, looks like a movie worth watching.

At first I couldn't figure it out why a 720p @1700 Kb/s encoding could get as large as 4GB, but when I saw the runtime (272min ?!?) and checked it on IMDB, I realized that there was no mistake. Hard to watch it on a cinema (at least for me) as it's longer than some mini TV series... I haven't known much about the movie, but I trust Cody's tastes, so thanks a lot Cody!
